- Format: ZIP file containing JSON data
- Expires: {{ expires_at|date:"F j, Y, g:i A" }}

{{ download_url }}

This download link will expire on {{ expires_at|date:"F j, Y, g:i A" }} for your security. After this date, you'll need to request a new export.

Security Notes:
- This link is unique to your request and can only be used by someone with access to this email
- The download is tracked for security purposes
- Please download your data promptly as the file will be automatically deleted after expiration

If you have any questions about this data export, please contact our support team.
